boardgame.name: Village Attacks
boardgame.description: Village Attacks is a co-operative castle defense game in which players take on the roles of the most infamous creatures of folklore and legend from around the world! Deep in a remote part of the world, you and your monstrous associates have taken up residence in an immense castle. But the local village has had enough of the evil that lies at its door and has decided to lay siege to the castle in an effort to exorcise your wicked taint from the world._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The villagers may be weak, but they are not alone! News of your malevolent presence has spread far and wide; hunters and heroes have come from all corners of the globe to vanquish you! Some have come for the fame, others for the glory, and some even for the reward. But they share a single goal; your doom!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;(Espa_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ntilde;ol)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Village Attack es un juego cooperativo donde los personajes toman el papel de las criaturas m_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;aacute;s infames y aterradoras de las leyendas y el folklore._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Los jugadores (de 1 a 5) tomar_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;aacute;n el papel de monstruos que tienen que defenderse en su castillo de las hordas de campesinos que vienen a matarlos. Su misi_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;oacute;n: defender el coraz_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;oacute;n del castillo y matar cuantos m_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;aacute;s campesinos mejor._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Con tanta muerte a sus espaldas, los monstruos ganan experiencia y pueden evolucionar sus habilidades para hacerse m_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;aacute;s poderosos._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Una IA controlada por el juego mismo, 66 Miniaturas de alta calidad y detalle, 16 losetas de castillo bellamente dibujadas, 6 dados personalizados y 5 tableros de monstruos, entre otras cosas, hacen que jugar a Village Attack sea una experiencia cooperativa completa, donde todos los jugadores luchan por lo mismo: sobrevivir._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

PREORDER for Kickstarter Village Attacks _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;Pitchfork Pledge_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; Includes Village Attacks Base Game Grimlord Town Hero (Kickstarter Exclusive) Extra set of Kickstarter Exclusive Black Marble Dice ALL Stretch Goals Includes over 60+ Miniatures See images for everything included. Village Attacks is a cooperative castle defense game for 1-5 players that sees players taking on the roles of the most infamous and feared creatures of folklore and legend! Deep in a remote part of the world, you and your monstrous brethren have taken up residence in an immense castle in the foothills of lands where most fear to tread. But the local village has had enough of the evil that lies at its door and has decided to lay siege to the castle in an effort to drive you out and destroy whatever ties you to this world. All items will be shipped the SAME day I receive them. Game is expected to be delivered in MAY 2018 (date may change). Condition will be NEW and exactly as I receive them from the distributor. Excludes any additional Kickstarter purchasable add-on_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s. If you have any questions please feel free to ask. I am offering multiple shipping options. Pick which you prefer! Village Attacks contains: 5 Monster miniatures 32 Peasant miniatures 24 Hunter miniatures 5 Town Hero miniatures 1 Rule book 14 game tiles 1 Game Overview tile 5 monster dashboards 5 Town Hero tokens 6 custom engraved dice 40 Villager Spawn cards 20 Trap cards 20 Village Event cards 40 coloured clip on bases 1 dice bag 80+ tokens All of out miniatures are 35mm scale and mass produced from high quality PVC plastics.
PRE-ORDER: Expected Delivery Q1 2018 This is a pre-order for the Kickstarter version of Village Attacks Pitchfork Pledge, all applicable stretch goals included. $14.99 shipping to US!
PRE-ORDER: Expected Delivery Q1 2018 This is a pre-order for the Kickstarter version of Village Attacks Pitchfork Pledge, all applicable stretch goals included. $14.99 shipping to US!

This is for the entire Pitchfork pledge of Village Attacks. All brand new in shrink and in hand. Shipping will be $15.00. I will cover the rest. The traps expansion is not shown in the pictures. Contents: - Village Attacks Base Game - Troll expansion - 3D Traps expansion - Additional dice (Marbled exclusive) - Despair _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Abhorrence (Vodyanoy _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Baba Yaga Monster and Fishermand _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Portal Mage Heroes) - Wrath _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Ruin (Glaistig _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Leshy Monster and Pathfinder and Jailer town heroes) - Rage _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Avarice (Baykok _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Wendigo Mosters and Spirit Tracker _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Wind Dancer Heroes) - Box of other Exclusive items (Grimlord Monster and Hero and the Succubus Monster.) There may be a couple more tiles and such in this box... but the three things I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve noted are for certain.

Brand new sealed from the kickstarter Comes with everything from the pitchfork pledge This comes with: Base Game Wrath _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Ruin Rage _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Avarice Despair _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Abhorrence Traps The Troll Marble Dice Set

Complete Kickstarter Pitchfork pledge. (Including the large troll mini.) Everything is new and in shrink wrap. Buyer to pay actual shipping from zip code 90049 (Los Angeles). The box is heavy (~13 lb) and bulky, and I guesstimate shipping will be in the $30-$50 range. If you have a shipping account you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d like me to use (UPS, FedEx, etc) I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m happy to do so. Please feel free to ask me for a shipping quote. Free local pickup is available in Santa Monica or West LA.

For this purchase, the base game Village Attacks will also include the expansions: The Troll Traps Despair _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Abhorrence The base game and expansions were opened and the board game accessories were bagged for protection, but the base game and expansions were never played. Buyer pays shipping cost and the base game along with the expansions will ship in one package via UPS-Ground.

Contains entire Kickstarter pledge plus addons Terror and Anguish, Doom and Suffering, Dice Bundle, and Essen Fair Acyrilc Token Set. Plus get all the core game monsters and heroes painted. Check out the pictures for the entire deal.

Auction is for the following: Kickstarter core box with unlocked content (and exclusives) All-in bundle (6 expansion boxes) Additionnal Troll (so it makes 2 Trolls. It’s useless but they’re awesome) Most boxes have been opened. But the game has never been played (so far). Still unpunched. Shipping is 6,00€ within Belgium, 16.40€ to the Nederlands, France or Germany. 32,40€ otherwise.
